name: RotoDefendo
description:
Created for One Button Jam 2016. Press any button to Defendo your Roto against an onslaught of no-good triangles.

This game is free, but if you like it, please consider donating! You will be helping to fund PAN GALACTIC RAILWAY, a game about driving a Space Train. It's gonna be great, I hope! And your support could make it greater!

My name is Dave, I live in Japan. You can find me on Twitter and stuff.

CONTROLS: Basically every button on your keyboard. You can also click on the game with your mouse, if you want.

STREAMING: Yeah, go for it! I wanna see your high scores, too!

MAC USERS: In order to play this game, you may need to allow apps from outside the Mac app store. To do this, go to Apple menu > System Preferences... > Security & Privacy > General tab. Click the lock in the lower left corner, enter your computer's password, and then select the option to allow apps downloaded from anywhere.
